website_summaries.verdict: The simple and straightforward construction of the Puma Carson 2 X allowed it to be a commendable shoe with most of its buyers. The shoe was praised for its appearance, fit, and weight. Because of how lightweight and comfortable the Carson 2 X was, many users reported their desire to buy another pair as they were satisfied with their experience of wearing the shoe.
pros: The Puma Carson 2 X was a comfortable shoe, according to a number of
Several users agreed that the shoe gave an accurate fit
A lot of buyers mentioned that the shoe looked great and did not look cheap at all
One customer said the Carson 2 X felt like slippers because of its low weight, while another compared the experience to being barefoot
Some wearers enjoyed the easy pull-on feature of the shoe
cons: Some buyers were disappointed with the shoe’s durability: One shared that the stitches on the upper started to unravel after only a week, while another thought the shoe was not cut out for intense
One commenter wrote that the Carson 2 X felt tight at first, and needed breaking in

customer_reviews.title: Good street shoe, not athletic
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a half size up. This shoe doesn't have a separate tongue, it's the sick to fit so it's nice and snug and a little hard to get on. They're very light weight, breathable, and look great. The sole is sturdy with not much cushion. Good street shoe, not for anything athletic.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these when I am tending bar, or going to be on my feet for extended periods of time. They hold up to my above average wear and tear and they provide great support. I love this pair of sneakers, and when I eventually kill them, I will buy another pair to abuse. They let your feet breathe, but in that same vain, they do not protect your feet from liquids. Try not to step in any deep puddles, or your feet will be soaked.
customer_reviews.author: That Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is VERY PICKY WITH BRAND AND LOOK, loves these...he is 13 and into the expensive everything. I was happy to get a pair of shoes around $50 that made him happy and that are great quality. They are thick enough on the material than his regular picks of thin material shoes, that they look like they will hold up through the winter, and the sole is thick so this momma is happy to have a sturdy investment!!
customer_reviews.author: The momster

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursing school
customer_reviews.text: I got this shoes for my clinicals at my nursing school since they require white shoes, and they're fantastic. The nursing instructors warned that most white shoes look absolutely horrible, but I was determined to find a pair that aren't. I'm fortunate I ran into these because they certainly look great and not like your cheap pair of white shoes at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Zavage

customer_reviews.title: Nice leisure shoes for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well, great shoes to wear around for leisure, very lightweight and comfy- don’t try to do anything athletic in them, not built for that. For the money, I sure get a lot of compliments on them! Love the knit shoes, and these didn’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sines

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I stand a lot for work but don’t need heavy-duty work boots or thick soled shoes like a waiter, so these fit my needs perfectly. I had Vans ISOs that I loved, these are softer and breath easily but run a little small and I don’t think they’re quite as stylish, but the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: KiloAlpha831

customer_reviews.title: Love these Knitted Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Nothing compares to the fit of a Knitted sneaker. It just hugs your feet, provides a snug fit without unecissary pressure points. I would recommend the Puma brand knitted sneakers to anyone. They’re by far my favorite. Lightweight and great for running. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gargano

customer_reviews.title: Very clunky and hard - it is made of a single piece of plastic. Cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to put on or take off - it is a solid piece of fabric-covered plastic basically with no separate tongue and no give on the sides or back or front when you put the shoe on or take it off. Also given the construction, it's not really going to "break in." Wore three times (overall comfortable once on, but no real give) and ended up just donating to charity.
customer_reviews.author: seattlejj

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, I hope
customer_reviews.text: Very light shoe. Upper part of shoe breaths nicely keeping feet cool. I have black upper and black soles. I have three pairs. They are tough, I do light yard work with one pair.
customer_reviews.author: paladin

customer_reviews.title: they are great for normal to wide feet
customer_reviews.text: i happen to have normal/narrow feet. EDIT: the material seems to shrink in the appropriate areas and it seems to fit my feet more snuggly after about two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Vittorio B.

customer_reviews.title: LIKELEY MY MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: JUST TOO TIGHT ACROSS THE TOP OF MY FOOT. THOUGHT IT WAS MORE OF A LACE UP STYLE
customer_reviews.author: dag hellstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. They are comfortable, light, and the material is very breathable. Only problem I have is they are made to be worn with no socks or extremely thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: A.V.

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft or as comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as soft or comfortable as the Carson 2s.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Robertson

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and conforms to your arch and foot!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend decided to purchase after seeing me wearing them. He loves the fit ,comfort and style. Great price and purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: WORTHY
customer_reviews.text: Súper comfortable, minimalistically stylish and lightweight- no visible logos, which I love, and fresh
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. If you buy Puma you might need to go a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe like very much
customer_reviews.text: But these do run small, so order a larger size than normal.
customer_reviews.author: kgypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes because they are lightweight but have the support I need. They slip on and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nona-de-Plume

customer_reviews.title: Carson 2
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 in Boots but my your was right at the top. I ordered a 7.5 and they are the absolute best shoe I own! I love them, they're so comfortable and I receive so many compliments! Thinking of buying a second pair...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoe feels too light and not as good of a quality as most other Puma products
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, color as shown in photo. Husband loves it. No significant sweating after long hours of usage.
customer_reviews.author: GaGa

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the size is right before the payment confirmation
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with my first order, but the return was easy, even though I had to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but tight
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came on time. I tried on some pumas in a store and I'm glad I did. I wear 10.5 in other shoes but 9.5 in pumas. These fit tight width wise but good from toe to heel.
customer_reviews.author: alani

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, not durable
customer_reviews.text: These feel great on my feet but they don’t hold up. Also the color of these shoes is a bit odd. Look at the pictures carefully and you can tell they are dual tone and shift color based on angle and light. After two weeks of occasional wear the stitching is unraveling. Very lightly worn and starting to fall apart. Not pleased with the quality on this one. Again, super comfortable. I so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Only good for causal walks not really meant for running
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Only good for causal walks not really meant for running.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony9

customer_reviews.title: Insert is not removeable
customer_reviews.text: Third pair , great street running shoe. No problem with my shoe inserts even though the actual shoe inserts can't be taken out.
customer_reviews.author: robert hamilton

customer_reviews.title: He would like to have more arch support
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these shoes. He would like to have more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All White, Jusr Right
customer_reviews.text: They are just as I thought except they run a little small so order a half size larger. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Burton

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A bit more snug than my original Carson (1) shoes but pretty close to size. Lack of a real “tongue” make them a bit of a struggle to slip into.
customer_reviews.author: cb577

customer_reviews.title: Simply a great show from Puma
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Super light. Awesome color. Feels like you have no shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s light weighted and has a comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The color is as shown in pics ... it’s light weighted and has a comfortable sole
customer_reviews.author: vaibhav sheth

customer_reviews.title: It is not a size 12
customer_reviews.text: Im a size 12 and it feels like a size 11 very frustated with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: juan diaz

customer_reviews.title: it runs a little small.
customer_reviews.text: nothing. i would purchase this product again. just a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: JIMMY GORDON

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: left foot fit. right foot too small. I have other pairs of puma, same size that fit fine...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But the material is super easy to
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit really well. But the material is super easy to break
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the most comfortable running shoes I have purchased. Can't wait to order more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like it but is was like one size too small
customer_reviews.author: ROMMEL

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Carson 2 X Sneaker
product_meta.description: Carson 2 x new upper offers a fresh take on Carson 2. A clean simple upper provides a modern feel.
